result.content:
# Curriculum FIR München In this book all information about the training process in FIR München is provided. Report any errors to LM FIR München. . Contact · S1 Training · S2 Training (TWR) · S3 Training (APP) · C1 Training (CTR) ## Contact The Mentors of FIR München are available for answering your questions and will be conducting your training. The Mentoring team is lead by the Lead Mentor (LM), the several training steps are organized and overseen by the Chiefs of Training (CoT)s. The CoTs are your first point of contact for any open questions regarding training material and the training process.
Responsible for training in FIR München
Lead Mentor Jannik Vogel --
Chiefs of Training (CoTs) Damian Gräfe S1 Training and TWR NUE
Mark Müncheberg TWR MUC
vacant APP
Jannik Vogel CTR
## S1 Training ### Requirements · VATSIM Account is assigned to vACC Germany, according to "first steps ATC". · Join the waiting list for one of the vACC-wide Basic Lessons in this thread. · Installed Euroscope and set it up according to the manual. · Installed Audio for Vatsim Standalone Client. · Installed Teamspeak and gained access to Vatsim Germany teamspeak according to the manual. ### Procedure and contents of the training Rf. this thread. ## S2 Training (TWR) This page is still work in progress. If you find any erroneous information, please contact LM of FIR München! Information on this site may have changed since your last visit without prior notice/announcement. ### General The S2 training in FIR München takes place at three airports. They differ in classification between tier 1 (former major airport) and unrestricted status:
Tier 1 Unrestricted
EDDM EDDN | EDDP
#### Requirements for applying . You have controlled for at least 10 hours within the last two months at one of the S1 training airports within FIR München (EDJA, EDMA, EDMO, EDDC, EDDE, EDQM). To start your training in EDDM (tier 1 airport) you have to apply for training to gain a ground endorsement. This training can be requested in the "Ausbildungsplanung" thread in our forum. The listed 10 hours of minimum activity are the absolute lower limit, you are explicitly encouraged to be much more active. The time between applying for the EDDM ground endorsement and actually receiving it is also not waiting time. It is meant for you to be actively controlling a smaller Tower position and gain experience. ## Training steps for training in EDDM Tier 1 ground endorsement Requirements . You have controlled for at least 10 hours within the last two months at one of the S1 training airports within FIR München (EDJA, EDMA, EDMO, EDDC, EDDE, EDQM). · You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München. ### PRESIM Moodle course Prior your first training, you are going to study the PRESIM theory in a self-study moodle course. You will be enrolled in this course after a mentor has contacted you reagarding your request in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung". Please refrain from repeated enquiries about the current process of your request. We are going to restrict/balance the number of simultaneous trainees according to the capacity of our mentors and the airport itself. The access to this course will normally be given according to the waiting list for training at EDDM, exceptions may be granted by our mentors in accordance with the VATEUD Department Training Policy. #### First training After completion of the required theory for your first training, you may request a EDDM_DEL training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" as described in the moodle course. The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDM_DEL in which all relevant theory and practical skills for München Delivery will be applied. A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson may be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge. If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDM_1/2/3_GND. #### Second training The second training is normally a simulation session on EDDM_1/2/3_GND (München Apron). Good theoretical knowledge of all theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If your mentor is satisfied with your performance, you will receive a Tier 1 ground endorsement. If not, another session may be required or training may be continued at an unrestricted airport. ### Apron checkout #### Requirements . You have controlled at least 30 hours on the ground endorsement. · You have requested your Apron checkout in the the thread "Ausbildungsplanung". · You have booked the station with the "Training" option checked as soon as the training date is confirmed by a mentor. If there is a booking conflict, your training takes precedence. Contact the other controller independently to resolve the scheduling conflict. If no agreement can be reached, a mentor may assist you upon request. In the apron checkout, a mentor is going to determine wether your theoretical knowledge and practical skills on delivery and apron are sufficient. The checkout usually has a duration of at least one hour, after that the mentor will debrief the session with you. If the mentor is satisfied with the result of your checkout, your are eligible to proceed with the training for München Tower. ### Tower training #### Requirements · You have passed your apron checkout. · You have passed the module "Conversion Lesson EDDM_TWR" in the Moodle course. · You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München. #### First training If you fulfill all requirements, a mentor will contact you to schedule an appointment for a training lesson. The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDM_TWR in which all relevant theory and practical skills for München Tower and München Ground (not Apron!) will be applied. A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson may be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge. If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDM_TWR. #### Second training The second training is normally an online training on EDDM_TWR. Good theoretical knowledge of all theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If your mentor is satisfied with your performance, you will receive a solo endorsement for München Tower, which is limited to a 30 days duration. If not, another session may be required or training may be continued at an unrestricted airport. #### During your solo endorsement · Staff as much as possible on München Tower. · Gain experience, hone your controlling skills, be open to feedback. Latest 21 days into your solo endorsement, you shall request another Training with a mentor to extend your solo endorsement. #### Solo extension training . You have controlled for at least 15 hours within the last 21 days on München Tower. · You have requested a solo extension training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München. During this training, a mentor will check if your knowledge and practical skills are within the desired training progress. If your mentor is satisfied with your training progress, your solo endorsement will be extended by an additional 30 days. If not, your endorsement will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled or training may continue at an unrestricted airport. #### Tower "Over the Shoulders" (OTS) . You have controlled for at least 50 hours on München Tower, of which 15 hours were within the last 21 days. · You have requested a Tower OTS in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München. During the OTS, a mentor will observe you for at least one hour to determine whether you are ready for a Controller Practical Test (CPT) on München Tower. If so, a date for a CPT will be set. If not, your Solo will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled or training may continue at an unrestricted airport. #### Tower CPT If a mentor reports you ready for CPT after your OTS, a CPT date will be set. The CPT will be conducted according to our "Ausbildungsrichtlinien" (training regulations), the EUD Training regulations, and GCAP. If you pass your CPT, your rating will be upgraded to S2 and you will receive a tier 1 endorsement for München Tower. ### Training steps for training in EDDP #### Ground Checkout ### Requirements . You have controlled for at least 10 hours within the last two months at one of the S1 training airports within FIR München. . You have controlled for at least 5 hours within the last two months at EDDP (GND or DEL) · You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München. ### PRESIM Moodle course Prior your first training, you are going to study the PRESIM theory in a self-study moodle course. You will be enrolled in this course after a mentor has contacted you reagarding your request in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung". Please refrain from repeated enquiries about the current process of your request. We are going to restrict/balance the number of simultaneous trainees according to the capacity of our mentors and the airport itself. The access to this course will normally be given according to the waiting list for training at EDDP, exceptions may be granted by our mentors in accordance with the VATEUD Department Training Policy. #### First training After completion of the required theory for your first training, you may request a "EDDP_GND Checkout" training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" as described in the moodle course. The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDP_GND in which all relevant theory and practical skills for Leipzig Delivery and Ground will be applied. A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson will be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge. If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDP_TWR. ### Tower training #### Requirements · You have passed your ground checkout. . You have passed the module "Conversion Lesson EDDP_TWR" in the Moodle course. . You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München as described in the Moodle course. ### First training If you fulfill all requirements, a mentor will contact you to schedule an appointment for a training lesson. The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDP_TWR in which all relevant theory and practical skills for Leipzig Tower will be applied. Again: A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson may be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge. If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDP_TWR. ### Second training The second training is normally a sim session on EDDP_TWR, in wich you are controlling top-down. Good theoretical knowledge of all theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If your mentor is satisfied with your performance, you will receive a solo endorsement for Leipzig Tower, which is limited to a 30 days duration. If not, another session may be required. ### During your solo endorsement · Staff as much as possible on Leipzig Tower. · Gain experience, hone your controlling skills, be open to feedback. Latest 21 days into your solo endorsement, you shall request another Training with a mentor to extend your solo endorsement. #### Solo extension training . You have controlled for at least 15 hours within the last 21 days on Leipzig Tower. · You have requested a solo extension training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München. During this training, a mentor will check if your knowledge and practical skills are within the desired training progress. If your mentor is satisfied with your training progress, your solo endorsement will be extended by an additional 30 days. If not, your endorsement will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled. #### Tower "Over the Shoulders" (OTS) . You have controlled for at least 50 hours on Leipzig Tower, of which 15 hours were within the last 21 days. · You have requested a Tower OTS in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD ☒ ☐ forum of FIR München. During the OTS, a mentor will observe you for at least one hour to determine whether you are ready for a Controller Practical Test (CPT) on Leipzig Tower. If so, a date for a CPT will be set. For this reason, the training should take place on an event day or at the weekend If not, your Solo will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled. ##### Tower CPT If a mentor reports you ready for CPT after your OTS, a CPT date will be set. The CPT will be conducted according to our "Ausbildungsrichtlinien" (training regulations), the EUD Training regulations, and GCAP. If you pass your CPT, your rating will be upgraded to S2. ## S3 Training (APP) This page is still work in progress. If you find any erroneous information, please contact LM of FIR München! Information on this site may have changed since your last visit without prior notice/announcement. ### General The S3 training in FIR München takes place at two airports. They differ in classification between tier 1 (former major airport) and unrestricted status:
Tier 1 Unrestricted
EDDM EDDN
#### Requirements · You have controlled at least 25 hours on_TWR positions, . In the last two months, you controlled at least 10 hours on a TWR position underlying the APP sector you want to start your training on, · Your passed your S2 CPT at least 3 months ago. To start your Approach training you have to apply for a training session in the "Ausbildungsplanung" thread in our forum. # C1 Training (CTR) This page is still work in progress, Any information is not yet intended for operational use!

lines.content: Curriculum FIR
München
In this book all information about the training process in FIR München is provided. Report any
errors to LM FIR München.
. Contact
· S1 Training
· S2 Training (TWR)
· S3 Training (APP)
· C1 Training (CTR)
Contact
The Mentors of FIR München are available for answering your questions and will be conducting your
training.
The Mentoring team is lead by the Lead Mentor (LM), the several training steps are organized and
overseen by the Chiefs of Training (CoT)s. The CoTs are your first point of contact for any open
questions regarding training material and the training process.
Responsible for training in FIR München
Lead Mentor
Jannik Vogel
Chiefs of Training (CoTs)
Damian Gräfe
S1 Training and TWR NUE
Mark Müncheberg
TWR MUC
vacant
APP
Jannik Vogel
CTR
S1 Training
Requirements
· VATSIM Account is assigned to vACC Germany, according to "first steps ATC".
· Join the waiting list for one of the vACC-wide Basic Lessons in this thread.
· Installed Euroscope and set it up according to the manual.
· Installed Audio for Vatsim Standalone Client.
· Installed Teamspeak and gained access to Vatsim Germany teamspeak according to the
manual.
Procedure and contents of the training
Rf. this thread.
S2 Training (TWR)
This page is still work in progress. If you find any erroneous information, please contact LM
of FIR München! Information on this site may have changed since your last visit without prior
notice/announcement.
General
The S2 training in FIR München takes place at three airports. They differ in classification between
tier 1 (former major airport) and unrestricted status:
Tier 1
Unrestricted
EDDM
EDDN | EDDP
Requirements for applying
. You have controlled for at least 10 hours within the last two months at one of the S1
training airports within FIR München (EDJA, EDMA, EDMO, EDDC, EDDE, EDQM).
To start your training in EDDM (tier 1 airport) you have to apply for training to gain a ground
endorsement. This training can be requested in the "Ausbildungsplanung" thread in our forum.
The listed 10 hours of minimum activity are the absolute lower limit, you are explicitly
encouraged to be much more active. The time between applying for the EDDM ground
endorsement and actually receiving it is also not waiting time. It is meant for you to be
actively controlling a smaller Tower position and gain experience.
Training steps for training in EDDM
Tier 1 ground endorsement
Requirements
. You have controlled for at least 10 hours within the last two months at one of the S1
training airports within FIR München (EDJA, EDMA, EDMO, EDDC, EDDE, EDQM).
· You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD
forum of FIR München.
PRESIM Moodle course
Prior your first training, you are going to study the PRESIM theory in a self-study moodle course.
You will be enrolled in this course after a mentor has contacted you reagarding your request in the
thread "Ausbildungsplanung".
Please refrain from repeated enquiries about the current process of your request. We are
going to restrict/balance the number of simultaneous trainees according to the capacity of
our mentors and the airport itself.
The access to this course will normally be given according to the waiting list for training at EDDM,
exceptions may be granted by our mentors in accordance with the VATEUD Department Training
Policy.
First training
After completion of the required theory for your first training, you may request a EDDM_DEL
training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" as described in the moodle course.
The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDM_DEL in which all relevant theory
and practical skills for München Delivery will be applied. A good knowledge of the theory published
in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson may be terminated in case of
lacking theoretical knowledge.
If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor
will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDM_1/2/3_GND.
Second training
The second training is normally a simulation session on EDDM_1/2/3_GND (München Apron). Good
theoretical knowledge of all theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If your
mentor is satisfied with your performance, you will receive a Tier 1 ground endorsement. If not,
another session may be required or training may be continued at an unrestricted airport.
Apron checkout
Requirements
. You have controlled at least 30 hours on the ground endorsement.
· You have requested your Apron checkout in the the thread "Ausbildungsplanung".
· You have booked the station with the "Training" option checked as soon as the training
date is confirmed by a mentor. If there is a booking conflict, your training takes
precedence. Contact the other controller independently to resolve the scheduling conflict.
If no agreement can be reached, a mentor may assist you upon request.
In the apron checkout, a mentor is going to determine wether your theoretical knowledge and
practical skills on delivery and apron are sufficient. The checkout usually has a duration of at least
one hour, after that the mentor will debrief the session with you.
If the mentor is satisfied with the result of your checkout, your are eligible to proceed with the
training for München Tower.
Tower training
Requirements
· You have passed your apron checkout.
· You have passed the module "Conversion Lesson EDDM_TWR" in the Moodle course.
· You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD
forum of FIR München.
First training
If you fulfill all requirements, a mentor will contact you to schedule an appointment for a training
lesson.
The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDM_TWR in which all relevant theory
and practical skills for München Tower and München Ground (not Apron!) will be applied. A good
knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson
may be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge.
If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor
will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDM_TWR.
Second training
The second training is normally an online training on EDDM_TWR. Good theoretical knowledge of all
theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If your mentor is satisfied with your
performance, you will receive a solo endorsement for München Tower, which is limited to a 30 days
duration. If not, another session may be required or training may be continued at an unrestricted
airport.
During your solo endorsement
· Staff as much as possible on München Tower.
· Gain experience, hone your controlling skills, be open to feedback.
Latest 21 days into your solo endorsement, you shall request another Training with a mentor to
extend your solo endorsement.
Solo extension training
. You have controlled for at least 15 hours within the last 21 days on München Tower.
· You have requested a solo extension training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within
the ATD forum of FIR München.
During this training, a mentor will check if your knowledge and practical skills are within the
desired training progress. If your mentor is satisfied with your training progress, your solo
endorsement will be extended by an additional 30 days.
If not, your endorsement will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor
will be scheduled or training may continue at an unrestricted airport.
Tower "Over the Shoulders" (OTS)
. You have controlled for at least 50 hours on München Tower, of which 15 hours were
within the last 21 days.
· You have requested a Tower OTS in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD
forum of FIR München.
During the OTS, a mentor will observe you for at least one hour to determine whether you are
ready for a Controller Practical Test (CPT) on München Tower. If so, a date for a CPT will be set.
If not, your Solo will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be
scheduled or training may continue at an unrestricted airport.
Tower CPT
If a mentor reports you ready for CPT after your OTS, a CPT date will be set. The CPT will be
conducted according to our "Ausbildungsrichtlinien" (training regulations), the EUD Training
regulations, and GCAP.
If you pass your CPT, your rating will be upgraded to S2 and you will receive a tier 1 endorsement
for München Tower.
Training steps for training in EDDP
Ground Checkout
Requirements
. You have controlled for at least 10 hours within the last two months at one of the S1
training airports within FIR München.
. You have controlled for at least 5 hours within the last two months at EDDP (GND or DEL)
· You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD
forum of FIR München.
PRESIM Moodle course
Prior your first training, you are going to study the PRESIM theory in a self-study moodle course.
You will be enrolled in this course after a mentor has contacted you reagarding your request in the
thread "Ausbildungsplanung".
Please refrain from repeated enquiries about the current process of your request. We are
going to restrict/balance the number of simultaneous trainees according to the capacity of
our mentors and the airport itself.
The access to this course will normally be given according to the waiting list for training at EDDP,
exceptions may be granted by our mentors in accordance with the VATEUD Department Training
Policy.
First training
After completion of the required theory for your first training, you may request a "EDDP_GND
Checkout" training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" as described in the moodle course.
The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDP_GND in which all relevant theory
and practical skills for Leipzig Delivery and Ground will be applied.
A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary,
the training lesson will be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge.
If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor
will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDP_TWR.
Tower training
Requirements
· You have passed your ground checkout.
. You have passed the module "Conversion Lesson EDDP_TWR" in the Moodle course.
. You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD
forum of FIR München as described in the Moodle course.
First training
If you fulfill all requirements, a mentor will contact you to schedule an appointment for a training
lesson.
The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDP_TWR in which all relevant theory
and practical skills for Leipzig Tower will be applied.
Again: A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely
necessary, the training lesson may be terminated in case of lacking theoretical
knowledge.
If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor
will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDP_TWR.
Second training
The second training is normally a sim session on EDDP_TWR, in wich you are controlling top-down.
Good theoretical knowledge of all theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If
your mentor is satisfied with your performance, you will receive a solo endorsement for Leipzig
Tower, which is limited to a 30 days duration. If not, another session may be required.
During your solo endorsement
· Staff as much as possible on Leipzig Tower.
· Gain experience, hone your controlling skills, be open to feedback.
Latest 21 days into your solo endorsement, you shall request another Training with a mentor to
extend your solo endorsement.
Solo extension training
. You have controlled for at least 15 hours within the last 21 days on Leipzig Tower.
· You have requested a solo extension training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within
the ATD forum of FIR München.
During this training, a mentor will check if your knowledge and practical skills are within the
desired training progress. If your mentor is satisfied with your training progress, your solo
endorsement will be extended by an additional 30 days.
If not, your endorsement will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor
will be scheduled.
Tower "Over the Shoulders" (OTS)
. You have controlled for at least 50 hours on Leipzig Tower, of which 15 hours were within
the last 21 days.
· You have requested a Tower OTS in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD
forum of FIR München.
During the OTS, a mentor will observe you for at least one hour to determine whether you are
ready for a Controller Practical Test (CPT) on Leipzig Tower. If so, a date for a CPT will be set. For
this reason, the training should take place on an event day or at the weekend
If not, your Solo will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be
scheduled.
Tower CPT
If a mentor reports you ready for CPT after your OTS, a CPT date will be set. The CPT will be
conducted according to our "Ausbildungsrichtlinien" (training regulations), the EUD Training
regulations, and GCAP.
If you pass your CPT, your rating will be upgraded to S2.
S3 Training (APP)
This page is still work in progress. If you find any erroneous information, please contact LM
of FIR München! Information on this site may have changed since your last visit without prior
notice/announcement.
General
The S3 training in FIR München takes place at two airports. They differ in classification between tier
1 (former major airport) and unrestricted status:
Tier 1
Unrestricted
EDDM
EDDN
Requirements
· You have controlled at least 25 hours on_TWR positions,
. In the last two months, you controlled at least 10 hours on a TWR position underlying the
APP sector you want to start your training on,
· Your passed your S2 CPT at least 3 months ago.
To start your Approach training you have to apply for a training session in the
"Ausbildungsplanung" thread in our forum.
C1 Training (CTR)
This page is still work in progress, Any information is not yet intended for operational use!

· You have requested your Apron checkout in the the thread "Ausbildungsplanung".

· You have booked the station with the "Training" option checked as soon as the training date is confirmed by a mentor. If there is a booking conflict, your training takes precedence. Contact the other controller independently to resolve the scheduling conflict. If no agreement can be reached, a mentor may assist you upon request.

In the apron checkout, a mentor is going to determine wether your theoretical knowledge and practical skills on delivery and apron are sufficient. The checkout usually has a duration of at least one hour, after that the mentor will debrief the session with you.
If the mentor is satisfied with the result of your checkout, your are eligible to proceed with the training for München Tower.
Tower training
Requirements
· You have passed your apron checkout.
· You have passed the module "Conversion Lesson EDDM_TWR" in the Moodle course.
· You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München.
First training
If you fulfill all requirements, a mentor will contact you to schedule an appointment for a training lesson.

The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDM_TWR in which all relevant theory and practical skills for München Tower and München Ground (not Apron!) will be applied. A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson may be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge.
If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDM_TWR.
Second training

The second training is normally an online training on EDDM_TWR. Good theoretical knowledge of all theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If your mentor is satisfied with your performance, you will receive a solo endorsement for München Tower, which is limited to a 30 days duration. If not, another session may be required or training may be continued at an unrestricted airport.
During your solo endorsement
· Staff as much as possible on München Tower.
· Gain experience, hone your controlling skills, be open to feedback.
Latest 21 days into your solo endorsement, you shall request another Training with a mentor to extend your solo endorsement.
Solo extension training
. You have controlled for at least 15 hours within the last 21 days on München Tower.
· You have requested a solo extension training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München.

During this training, a mentor will check if your knowledge and practical skills are within the desired training progress. If your mentor is satisfied with your training progress, your solo endorsement will be extended by an additional 30 days.
If not, your endorsement will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled or training may continue at an unrestricted airport.
Tower "Over the Shoulders" (OTS)
. You have controlled for at least 50 hours on München Tower, of which 15 hours were within the last 21 days.
· You have requested a Tower OTS in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München.
During the OTS, a mentor will observe you for at least one hour to determine whether you are ready for a Controller Practical Test (CPT) on München Tower. If so, a date for a CPT will be set.
If not, your Solo will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled or training may continue at an unrestricted airport.
Tower CPT

If a mentor reports you ready for CPT after your OTS, a CPT date will be set. The CPT will be conducted according to our "Ausbildungsrichtlinien" (training regulations), the EUD Training regulations, and GCAP.
If you pass your CPT, your rating will be upgraded to S2 and you will receive a tier 1 endorsement for München Tower.
Training steps for training in EDDP
Ground Checkout
Requirements
. You have controlled for at least 10 hours within the last two months at one of the S1 training airports within FIR München.
. You have controlled for at least 5 hours within the last two months at EDDP (GND or DEL)
· You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München.
PRESIM Moodle course

Prior your first training, you are going to study the PRESIM theory in a self-study moodle course. You will be enrolled in this course after a mentor has contacted you reagarding your request in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung".

Please refrain from repeated enquiries about the current process of your request. We are going to restrict/balance the number of simultaneous trainees according to the capacity of our mentors and the airport itself.
The access to this course will normally be given according to the waiting list for training at EDDP, exceptions may be granted by our mentors in accordance with the VATEUD Department Training Policy.
First training
After completion of the required theory for your first training, you may request a "EDDP_GND Checkout" training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" as described in the moodle course.
The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDP_GND in which all relevant theory and practical skills for Leipzig Delivery and Ground will be applied.
A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson will be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge.
If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDP_TWR.
Tower training
Requirements
· You have passed your ground checkout.
. You have passed the module "Conversion Lesson EDDP_TWR" in the Moodle course.
. You have requested a training lesson in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München as described in the Moodle course.
First training
If you fulfill all requirements, a mentor will contact you to schedule an appointment for a training lesson.
The first training lesson is normally a simulation session on EDDP_TWR in which all relevant theory and practical skills for Leipzig Tower will be applied.
Again: A good knowledge of the theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary, the training lesson may be terminated in case of lacking theoretical knowledge.
If your performance during the simulation session is within our training requirements, the mentor will schedule an appointment for a second training lesson on EDDP_TWR.
Second training

The second training is normally a sim session on EDDP_TWR, in wich you are controlling top-down. Good theoretical knowledge of all theory published in the Moodle course is absolutely necessary. If your mentor is satisfied with your performance, you will receive a solo endorsement for Leipzig Tower, which is limited to a 30 days duration. If not, another session may be required.
During your solo endorsement
· Staff as much as possible on Leipzig Tower.
· Gain experience, hone your controlling skills, be open to feedback.
Latest 21 days into your solo endorsement, you shall request another Training with a mentor to extend your solo endorsement.
Solo extension training
. You have controlled for at least 15 hours within the last 21 days on Leipzig Tower.
· You have requested a solo extension training in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD forum of FIR München.

During this training, a mentor will check if your knowledge and practical skills are within the desired training progress. If your mentor is satisfied with your training progress, your solo endorsement will be extended by an additional 30 days.
If not, your endorsement will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled.
Tower "Over the Shoulders" (OTS)
. You have controlled for at least 50 hours on Leipzig Tower, of which 15 hours were within the last 21 days.
· You have requested a Tower OTS in the thread "Ausbildungsplanung" within the ATD :selected:
:unselected: forum of FIR München.

During the OTS, a mentor will observe you for at least one hour to determine whether you are ready for a Controller Practical Test (CPT) on Leipzig Tower. If so, a date for a CPT will be set. For this reason, the training should take place on an event day or at the weekend
If not, your Solo will expire after 30 days and additional training sessions with a mentor will be scheduled.
Tower CPT

If a mentor reports you ready for CPT after your OTS, a CPT date will be set. The CPT will be conducted according to our "Ausbildungsrichtlinien" (training regulations), the EUD Training regulations, and GCAP.
If you pass your CPT, your rating will be upgraded to S2.
S3 Training (APP)

This page is still work in progress. If you find any erroneous information, please contact LM of FIR München! Information on this site may have changed since your last visit without prior notice/announcement.
General
The S3 training in FIR München takes place at two airports. They differ in classification between tier 1 (former major airport) and unrestricted status:
Tier 1
Unrestricted
EDDM
EDDN
Requirements
· You have controlled at least 25 hours on_TWR positions,
. In the last two months, you controlled at least 10 hours on a TWR position underlying the APP sector you want to start your training on,
· Your passed your S2 CPT at least 3 months ago.
To start your Approach training you have to apply for a training session in the "Ausbildungsplanung" thread in our forum.
C1 Training (CTR)
